","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1528979141585,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2912961","author":"maksimrv","authorFullName":"Maksim Ryzhikov","issueId":"JT-47643","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
Pavel Nikitin it's true and looks like we have an issue about it JT-47644
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1528979282363,"updated":1528979343209,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]}],"tag":[{"value":"Star","cssClass":"c0"}]}, {"id":"JT-46460","entityId":"25-1919879","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"JT"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"46460"},{"name":"summary","value":"New issue page view: do not collapse changes in history"},{"name":"description","value":"
Consider an issue with several history changes made at once.
E.g.: this issue: https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/KT-23227
See the changes made by Mikhail Glukhikh on 27 Mar 2018 10:35.
There are 3 changes: in Resolved date, in Verified, in State.

Compare old "classic" and new "experimental" issue view.
With new view these changes are "collapsed" by default, so only resolved date is shown.
This is the problem. Please do not collapse them.


To understand the usability problem consider the scenario: I see the issue Fixed. I want to search the history to see who has set Fixed. Not "resolved date". Imagine I need the State field specifically.
So I open the issue and scroll the history down. Words "State: In Progress -> Fixed" are not visible. Failure.
Ok, I use browser search on page. Type words "Fixed" or better "In progress": the found entry is not visible anyway. Failure.
I have to walk through the history and expand every change manually to find what I search for.

Who needs to save ~200 pixels on a long page?
If I have asked to show history then obviously, I need to see the history.

YouTrack 2018.1 build 40470.

Davydova","issueId":"JT-46460","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
Dmitry Gizatov Could you please comment on this?
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1522330169594,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":"youtrack-developers","markdown":false,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2787549","author":"Vitaly.Gordeev","authorFullName":"Vitaly Gordeev","issueId":"JT-46460","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

Also, in a given example (KT-23227), there were two changes, both affecting the issue state.
Meanwhile, collapsed lines present different changes: State in one case and Resolved date in another. Rather confusing.

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1522336484674,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2787561","author":"mitya","authorFullName":"Dmitry Gizatov","issueId":"JT-46460","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

So, it's a first version of collapsing history items. And now we work on some improvements.
This issue isn't about 200 px on a long page, it's about visual garbage in an activity stream.

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1522336883633,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2787588","author":"sashache","authorFullName":"Alexander Chernikov","issueId":"JT-46460","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
These words are not visual garbage.
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1522337477062,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2787617","author":"mitya","authorFullName":"Dmitry Gizatov","issueId":"JT-46460","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

In your example — not.
But in this case — yes.

As I said earlier this is the first version, we will think how to do it better.

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1522337848516,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2787634","author":"sashache","authorFullName":"Alexander Chernikov","issueId":"JT-46460","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
Just for case: in your picture I see only one potential garbage: the last record about .png attachments, that looks senseless.
All the rest records are useful.
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1522338191325,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2837735","author":"Vitaly.Gordeev","authorFullName":"Vitaly Gordeev","issueId":"JT-46460","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

There is no query to search for a field change (e.g. Fix Versions), so I actively work with the issue history. Due to this issue, I can't find who and when has changed the Fix Versions - I need to open each collapsed block. Manually. One by one. Scroll. Expand. Repeat.
For example, in this particular issue, tell me when @Dmitry Gizatov became an assignee?

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1524558716721,"updated":1522336484559,"permittedGroup":"jetbrains-team","markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2883199","author":"xi-eye","authorFullName":"Alexander Anisimov","issueId":"JT-46460","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
Dmitry Gizatov as an option we can try to add something like 'Do not collapse history' an option into 'Activity settings'
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1527083776491,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2898078","author":"xi-eye","authorFullName":"Alexander Anisimov","issueId":"JT-46460","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
We are going to implement this via settings in a stream.

@Alexander Anisimov it sure is

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1527844516785,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":"YouTrack Team","markdown":true,"replies":[]}],"tag":[]}, {"id":"JT-47483","entityId":"25-2010531","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"JT"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"47483"},{"name":"summary","value":"Issue distribution by arbitrary field with wide range of data can hang UI"},{"name":"description","value":"
  1. set up flat distribution report, where the distribution field has a range over several 1000 of values
  2. create such report or recalculate it

ER: the report calculates the result and shows the top of it
AR: the report hangs on the stage of result displaying or display it, but hangs on scrolling

  • Show links block expanded by default
  • font size: 8px letter-spacing: 0.1 em and make margins and paddings in accordance with the layout
  • Show star and delete only on hover
  • Make hover on resolved issues in a list, as in unresolved.
  • Do not show vote, comment, attachment icons without any votes, comments, and attachments
"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"created","value":"1527154249744"},{"name":"updated","value":"1528899946217"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"Anna.Zhdan"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Anna Zhdan"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"mitya"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Dmitry Gizatov"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"13"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"links","value":[{"value":"JT-47517","type":"Relates","role":"relates to"},{"value":"JT-47518","type":"Relates","role":"relates to"},{"value":"JT-47519","type":"Relates","role":"relates to"},{"value":"YTB-870","type":"Subtask","role":"subtask of"}]},{"name":"State","value":["Open"],"valueId":["Open"],"color":{"bg":"#fed74a","fg":"#444"}},{"name":"Subsystem","value":["Single Issue View"],"valueId":["Single Issue View"],"color":null},{"name":"Component","value":["Frontend"],"valueId":["Frontend"],"color":null},{"name":"Type","value":["Task"],"valueId":["Task"],"color":null},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"sprint","value":[{"value":"sprint 69","id":"YouTrack:sprint 69"}]},{"name":"attachments","value":[{"value":"image.png","id":"74-529295","url":"https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/_persistent/image.png?file=74-529295&c=true"},{"value":"image1.png","id":"74-532067","url":"https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/_persistent/image1.png?file=74-532067&c=true"}]}],"comment":[{"id":"27-2884794","author":"Ekaterina_Zaikina","authorFullName":"Ekaterina Zaikina","issueId":"JT-47335","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1527156951955,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2887438","author":"xi-eye","authorFullName":"Alexander Anisimov","issueId":"JT-47335","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1527237873199,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2887453","author":"xi-eye","authorFullName":"Alexander Anisimov","issueId":"JT-47335","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
